title: Is Monsanto Suppressing Evidence of a Cancerous Herbicide in Food?
subtitle: A laboratory test performed by food activists went viral, but its results and the allegations drawn from them were not reliable.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: A new analysis of the residue on common American foods showed high levels of the herbicide glyphosate and Monsanto, the EPA, and the FDA are in cahoots to silence word of the chemical’s harmful effects and its high concentration in foods.
